text: Old Montagnais is the period in the history of the Innu language preceding its current form. There are several sound changes that Old Montagnais underwent. One example is the change from Old Montagnais ayaškimew to modern Innu ayassimēw. Category:Innu culture Category:Indigenous languages of the North American eastern woodlands Category:Central Algonquian languages Category:First Nations languages in Canada
title: Old Montagnais
